rankings.summary: Unfair in Superflex: Mahomes + Herbert with Gibbs/Kamara/Swift and Kelce/A.J. Brown is Week 1 juggernaut. Depth everywhere; even the bench scares people.

key_players.name: Patrick Mahomes
key_players.note: Still the weekly nuclear option; no notes needed.

key_players.name: Justin Herbert
key_players.note: Top-8 Superflex anchor beside Mahomes; elite weekly floor.

key_players.name: Jahmyr Gibbs
key_players.note: Consensus top-5 PPR RB entering 2025; mismatch every week. ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/fantasy/football/story/_/id/43261183/2025-fantasy-football-rankings-ppr-mike-clay?utm_source=openai), [pff.com](https://www.pff.com/news/fantasy-football-2025-rankings-ppr-top-250?utm_source=openai), [athlonsports.com](https://athlonsports.com/fantasy/fantasy-football-top-200-ppr-rankings-draft-2025/?utm_source=openai))

key_players.name: Travis Kelce
key_players.note: Ages like fine bourbon; still projected as an elite TE1 for 2025. ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/fantasy/football/story/_/id/43261183/2025-fantasy-football-rankings-ppr-mike-clay?utm_source=openai))

key_players.name: A.J. Brown
key_players.note: Locked-in WR1 usage/efficiency again. ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/fantasy/football/story/_/id/43261183/2025-fantasy-football-rankings-ppr-mike-clay?utm_source=openai))

analysis.bench_potential: Jameson Williams boom routes, Javonte Williams volume spikes, Dalton Schultz TD-stream. Also… Henry Ruggs on the roster? lmao delete that fossil from your app.
analysis.make_or_break: WR2/3 volatility (Keenan Allen age curve) and Kelce’s weekly snap load are the only sweat points.

key_players.name: Tua Tagovailoa
key_players.note: High weekly ceiling paired with elite weapons.

analysis.bench_potential: Jayden Reed and Jordan Addison can both post WR2 weeks early; Audric Estimé/Tahj Brooks are stash-and-see rookies.

rankings.summary: Tyreek + JJ + London is silly. ARich/Love at QB, Kincaid/Andrews at TE, and deep RBs = weekly sledgehammer.

key_players.name: Tyreek Hill

key_players.name: Justin Jefferson

rankings.summary: Dual elite QBs (Lamar + Trevor), Saquon and a nasty WR room. Tank Dell likely out, but still deep enough to bully Week 1.

key_players.note: Top-3 QB every week; rushing floor is a cheat code.

key_players.note: Top-10 QB with cushy Week 1 streamer vibes. ([bigblueview.com](https://www.bigblueview.com/fantasy-football-2/134599/fantasy-football-25-week-1-fantasy-preview-start-sit-and-more?utm_source=openai))

analysis.bench_potential: Blake Corum/Kendre Miller could surge by October; Jaylen Warren is a PPR thorn who forces start-sit headaches (in a good way).
analysis.make_or_break: WR decisions among Waddle/Pittman/Higgins/Flowers each week. Good problem to have; set it and laugh.
